prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 3.7× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
Follow the stage instructions exactly.
The required response format will be shown at the END of each prompt.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
It is valid to stay silent; only speak when it helps.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is MOOSE.
<ROUND i="1">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
FORMAT: Output <CHAT>...</CHAT> or empty string if silent.
YOUR RESPONSE:
